edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core
Class HandlerService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core.HandlerService

public class HandlerService
extends Service

This class is the heart of OmniDroid. When this class receives a system intent from BCReceiver it calls IntentParser to create an Event if it is supported by OmniDroid. The event is passed to the RuleProcessor to see if the event's attributes are matched by the parameters of the user's defined Rule. The Action(s) of any rules that match are passed to ActionExecuter where they are packaged into system intents and run.
